name: Balduvian Trading Post
originalText:
If Balduvian Trading Post would come into play, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post into play. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {1}{R} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

rulings.text: You sacrifice the Mountain before this card is put onto the battlefield, and do so no matter how it is put onto the battlefield.
This card produces two different types of mana. If an effect that adds one mana to your mana pool of the same type as the mana produced by this card, you choose which of the two types it produces.

text:
If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.
{T}: Add {C}{R}.
{1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.
